Posts.Content: Butterfly64 wrote: I have recently lost quite a bit of weight which includes in my breasts. I have been told that I have fibrocystic breast disease and have tried to always be aware of changes in my breasts. The past week or so I have noticed lumpy areas -- they move freely and are not like rocks. I think it is just that I can feel the underlying muscles more now that I have lost weight. Is this normal when a large weight loss is experienced? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Changes Butterfly64 LaurenBinVA
